sentences.english: The new policy on food price will hurt the interest of people on low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 新的食品价格政策将伤害到低收入人群的利益。

sentences.english: Will it receive heartfelt support from the people concerned?
sentences.chinese: 有没有得到有关人群发自内心的拥护？

sentences.english: He tried in vain to push through the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他怎么也没法从人群里挤过去。

sentences.english: We pushed our way through the crowd.
The river banks were lined with people watching the boat race.
sentences.chinese: 河两岸站满了观看赛船的人群。

sentences.english: Come, join us in the magic of the Pacific and the pageantry of its people.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，请加入我们太平洋的奇幻世界和壮观的人群。

sentences.english: This is what makes this necklace special and standing out of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 这个就是什么使得这条项链特殊而站人群中挤出来的。

sentences.english: About 70% of the population is in sub-health state.
sentences.chinese: 人群中约有70%的人处于亚健康状态。

sentences.english: The crowd emptied into the street.
sentences.chinese: 人群全涌到大街上去了。

sentences.english: Population susceptibility to infection by a new virus drives the dynamics of an influenza pandemic.
sentences.chinese: 新病毒的人群易感性驱动流感大流行。

sentences.english: Results Anti HAV IgG positive rate of whole population increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 结果疫苗接种后人群总抗体阳性率有显著的提高。

sentences.english: The young man made a run for it. Soon the manager broke free of us too and charged.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人跑过来取了帽子，很快经理也从人群中挤出来。

sentences.english: Across the square they joined the growing throng outside the red temple.
sentences.chinese: 穿过广场，他们加入了红庙外不断增长的人群。

sentences.english: If we mingle with the crowd, we shall not be noticed.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们混在人群里，就不会被注意到了。

sentences.english: The villagers rushed down the street. Lorian was lost in the midst of them.
sentences.chinese: 村民们沿着街道向前涌去，洛里安也消失在人群中。

sentences.english: Around 11 o'clock the crowds start filtering out of the cinema.
sentences.chinese: 十一点左右，人群开始从电影院里逐渐走出来。

definition: stream of people/abortion/abbr. for 人工流產|人工流产[ren2 gong1 liu2 chan3]
ordinary person/private citizen/people/the person in the street
